thread.title: Zayn Malik is All Smiles After Filming Surprise ‘Tonight Show’ Cameo With Jimmy Fallon | Zayn Malik

title: Zayn Malik is All Smiles After Filming Surprise ‘Tonight Show’ Cameo With Jimmy Fallon | Zayn Malik
text: Zayn Malik is All Smiles After Filming Surprise 'Tonight Show' Cameo With Jimmy Fallon [Zayn Malik](https://www.justjared.com/tags/zayn-malik/) was in good spirits after filming a surprise cameo on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon. The 31-year-old “Pillowtalk” crooner [interrupted host](https://www.justjared.com/2024/03/14/zayn-malik-crashes-jimmy-fallons-tonight-show-monologue-to-promote-new-music-watch-now/) [Jimmy Fallon](https://www.justjared.com/tags/jimmy-fallon/) as he delivered his monologue during the March 13 episode of his popular late-night show. His purpose? To promote the [impending arrival of his new album Room Under the Stairs](https://www.justjared.com/2024/03/13/zayn-malik-announces-new-album-room-under-the-stairs-first-single-what-i-am-out-march-15th/). Clearly, he considered the surprise a success as he had a large smile on his face upon arriving back in London, England. Keep reading to find out more… Zayn was casually dressed in a sweatsuit, olive sneakers and a black baseball cap. A pair of dark sunglasses completed the look. The [first taste of Room Under the Stairs arrives very soon](https://www.justjared.com/2024/03/13/zayn-malik-announces-new-album-room-under-the-stairs-first-single-what-i-am-out-march-15th/). Check out the details! If you missed it, during a very rare interview, Zayn [revealed a situation where he saved](https://www.justjared.com/2024/03/14/zayn-malik-recalls-saving-harry-styles-from-a-scary-stage-accident-during-rare-interview/) [One Direction](https://www.justjared.com/tags/one-direction/) bandmate [Harry Styles](https://www.justjared.com/tags/harry-styles/) from what could have been a very dangerous onstage accident. Scroll through all of the new photos of Zayn Malik in the gallery… [Backgrid](https://backgridusa.backgrid.com/)Posted to: [Zayn Malik](https://www.justjared.com/tags/zayn-malik/)
